DOC.brief_summary: To Determine whether transcranial ultrasound detect presence intravenously injected microbubbles use routinely dobutamine stress echocardiography .
DOC.brief_title: Detection Ultrasound Contrast Signals Cerebral Circulation
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether intravenous microbubbles use improve border delineation dobutamine stress echocardiography ( DSE ) detect within cerebral circulation .
